detail_desc: Top in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a round neckline and long sleeves.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned cotton weave with a resort collar, French front, yoke at the back and straight-cut hem.
Short, 5-pocket shorts in washed stretch denim with worn details, a regular waist, zip fly and raw-edge hems.
Baby Exclusive. Puff shorts in a crinkled organic cotton weave with covered elastication at the waist and elasticated hems. Lined.
Baby Exclusive. Dress in narrow wale organic cotton corduroy with a frilled collar, buttons at the back and long raglan sleeves with elastication at the cuffs. Unlined.
Lace bikini briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and medium coverage at the back.
Jumper in a soft chunky knit with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and narrow ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket. Soft brushed inside.
Top in airy jersey crêpe with a V-neck, short cap sleeves and a small stand-up collar with gathers at the back of the neck.
Cap in cotton twill with an adjustable strap and metal fastener at the back.
Sleeveless top in a Tencel™ lyocell weave with a V-neck and ties at the top. Gathered yoke at the back and a gently rounded hem.
Pull-on jeans in stretch denim with elastication and a small frill at the waist and fake front pockets. Loose fit with gently tapered legs. Patterned jersey lining.
Plastic Alice bands in the shape of cat ears.
Trainers with a padded edge and tongue, elasticated lacing, a hook and loop tab at the front and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles.
Headband in a soft knit with a decorative knot detail at the front. Width approx. 15 cm.
Fine-knit socks in a cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.

Classic denim jacket in washed, stretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility. Collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and decorative flap chest pockets with a button. Unlined.
Short dress in soft jersey with a round neckline and short cap sleeves. Decorative seams front and back and a concealed zip at the back. Unlined.
T-shirts in soft jersey. The cotton content of the T-shirts is organic.
Ballet pump-style espadrilles in satin with a decorative bow at the front and braided jute trim around the soles. Canvas linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles.
Short shorts in soft viscose twill with a high waist that is elasticated at the back, a zip fly and button, pleats at the front and pockets in the side seams.
Jumper in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with a deep V-neck and long, wide sleeves.
Fully lined triangle bikini top with removable inserts, a knot detail at the front and ties at the back of the neck. Metal fastener at the back.
Off-the-shoulder top in sweatshirt fabric with long, wide sleeves and ribbed cuffs. Soft brushed inside.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and a lined front.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Short top in sweatshirt fabric with a stand-up collar and zip at the top. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Joggers in a linen weave with a regular, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a fake back pocket and tapered legs.
Hooded top in cotton jersey with long raglan sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Knitted moccasins with soft terry inside, an imitation leather trim and soft suede soles.
Jumper in a soft knit with long sleeves and a V-neck with a wide lace trim.
Chinos in an airy cotton weave with a zip fly, side pockets, welt back pockets and tapered legs.

Espadrilles with open sides, an adjustable strap with a metal buckle, elastication at the back, and a braided jute trim around the soles. Imitation leather linings and insoles, and fluted soles. Platform 4.5 cm.
Soft bikini top with removable inserts, double adjustable shoulder straps and no fasteners.

Calf-length skirt in lightweight, softly draping twill made from a Tencel™ lyocell and silk blend that changes colour depending on how the light catches it. Wide, concealed elastication at the waist, smocking at the top and a flare from the knees down. Unlined.

Long satin dress with a V-neck at the front, concealed zip at the back and cap sleeves. Seam with pleats at the waist and a wrapover skirt with high slits in the sides. Double-layered bodice and an unlined skirt.
CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Fitted slipover in fine-knit Tencel™ lyocell and wool with hole-embroidered sections, a round neckline, slightly deeper armholes and a roll-edge hem.
Long-sleeved blouse in a viscose weave with a wide, elasticated neckline, decorative buttons down the front and elastication at the cuffs and hem.
Pouch bag with a grained imitation leather top and transparent bottom to allow an easy overview of contents. Zip with a practical tab at the top. Width approx. 1.5 cm. Height 17 cm. Length 23 cm.
Straight-cut dress in a viscose weave with 3/4-length sleeves that are open at the top and have ties at the cuffs. Unlined.
Long cardigan in a fluffy knit with side pockets and roll-edge cuffs. No buttons.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Flared trousers in woven fabric with a regular waist, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Side pockets, back pockets and slim-cut legs with sewn-in creases and flared hems.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Wide, calf-length dress in woven fabric with a V-neck, small stand-up collar and concealed buttons at the front. Dropped shoulders and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.

Short dress in patterned chiffon with a round neckline and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with gathered shoulder seams and narrow elastication and a flounced trim at the cuffs. Elasticated seam at the waist and a layered skirt. Jersey lining.
Lace bras with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Shorts in woven fabric with a high waist, pleats at the front, a zip fly with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners and diagonal side pockets.
Double-layered triangular scarves in soft cotton jersey with an adjustable press-stud fastening at the back of the neck.
Short, fitted dress in a stretch cotton twill with narrow shoulder straps. Straight cut at the top, a seam at the waist and a visible zip at the back. Unlined.
Vest top in airy linen jersey. Deep V-neck at the back with a knot detail.
Pleated, calf-length skirt in woven fabric with a high, elasticated waist. Unlined.
V-neck blouse in soft, washed Tencel™ lyocell denim with a small, gathered stand-up collar, short raglan sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and an elasticated seam at the back. Unlined.

Push-up bra in lace with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back where they have a wide lace trim, and a narrow hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Fine-knit tights with an elasticated waist.

Straight-cut utility jacket in a cotton weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets, and large front pockets with a flap and press-stud. Adjustable tab and buttons at the back and buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Trainer sandals in woven fabric with glittery elastic straps over the feet. Canvas linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) toe caps and soles.
T-shirt in soft viscose jersey with a slightly wider neckline, short puff sleeves and straight-cut hem.
Patterned wellingtons with chunky, fluted soles.
Top in sequin-embroidered mesh with short, wide sleeves and slits in the sides.
Small oval waist bag in a sturdy weave with an appliqué on the front, zip at the top and a zipped outer compartment. Adjustable waist belt with a metal fastener. Size approx. 3.5x12x19.5 cm.
Set with a top and pair of dungarees in soft jersey made from a cotton blend.
Straight-cut T-shirt in soft cotton jersey. Round neckline with a narrow trim, gathered shoulder seams for a draped effect and short puff sleeves.
Long-sleeved jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Short, airy lace dress with a small stand-up collar and V-neck opening at the front with ties at the top. Short puff sleeves with covered elastication at the hems and gathered seams at the waist and hem for added width. V-neck underdress with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Baby Exclusive. Dungarees in double-weave organic cotton with covered elastication at the waist, straps with adjustable buttoning, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Lined top.
Jacket in soft faux fur with a round neckline, zip down the front and side pockets. Lined.
Fully lined, V-neck swimsuit with lightly padded cups and narrow adjustable shoulder straps.
Sleeveless bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch.
Calf-length, pleated skirt in an airy patterned weave with a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener in the side and a laser-cut hem. Unlined.
Bikini briefs in cotton jersey with narrow lace trims, a mid waist, lined gusset and medium coverage at the back.
Waist belt in grained imitation leather with a decorative metal ball chain along the edges and elastic and a metal buckle at the back.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with long raglan sleeves and a wrapover, jersey-lined funnel collar with a drawstring. Kangaroo pocket, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Baby Exclusive. Trousers in sturdy organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Round-necked T-shirt in premium cotton jersey.
Alice band with floral decorations on top.

Bomber jacket in softly draping, patterned satin with a sheen. Ribbed stand-up collar, a zip down the front with a ring pull, and long raglan sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Welt side pockets and covered elastication at the hem. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in jersey with a slightly wider neckline and overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem.
Nightdress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with short, elasticated raglan sleeves and an elasticated neckline.
